name: King's Legacy
summary:
Build your medieval kingdom and protect your people, explore, trade, gather resources, learn magic and spells and enjoy the spectacular full 3D graphics in King's Legacy.

The fair king died of old age. His people, all over the kingdom, cried and grieved. But finally they wiped the tears from their faces happy in the prospect of the dead king's son, replacing his father on the throne. But, suddenly, from the shadows, the dead king's evil brother emerges. He has waited his chance to claim the throne for a long time. A panic and fear spread among the people.

The young prince will protect his citizens by any means necessary, even if it means fighting his own uncle! No one will harm his people, no one will bring misery and pain to his people.
